content.prompt: Which of the following statements is false?

choices.label: lim x→1 f( x )=0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@425A@

lim x→2 g( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@409C@  does not exist.

lim x→1 ( f( x )g( x+1 ) ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4770@  does not exist.

lim x→1 ( f( x+1 )g( x ) ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4770@  exists.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Identify mathematical information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and/or verbal representations.
